document.full_text: an anchorage woman has been charged with inflicting years of abuse on her six adopted children, some so malnourished they did not reach puberty in their teen years, authorities said on wednesday.
document.title: anchorage woman charged with abusing 6 adopted kids
lines_and_colors: an anchorage woman has been charged with inflicting years of abuse on her six adopted children, some so malnourished they did not reach puberty in their teen years, authorities said on wednesday.
